word: <8054> Shammowth<8055> samach<8056> sameach<8057> simchah<8058> shamat<8059> sh@mittah<8060> Shammay<8061> Sh@miyda`<8062> Sh@miyda`iy<8063> s@miykah<8064> shamayim<8065> shamayin<8066> sh@miyniy<8067> sh@miyniyth<8068> shamiyr<8069> Shamiyr<8070> Sh@miyramowth<8071> simlah<8072> Samlah<8073> Shamlay<8074> shamem
etymology: from an unused root meaning to be lofty
definition:
1) heaven, heavens, sky
    1a) visible heavens, sky
        1a1) as abode of the stars
        1a2) as the visible universe, the sky, atmosphere, etc
    1b) Heaven (as the abode of God)
